languages.text: "Губернатор Медина ожидает вас у себя в командном центре, чтобы поговорить о делах. Однако я хочу просить вас повременить с визитом к губернатору и вместо этого обратить взор к станции Навис Нобилите. Мы отчаянно нуждаемся в новом навигаторе, а наши запросы связи по прежнему игнорируются. Я не вижу, что, кроме личного визита персоны вашего положения, может заставить представителей Навис Нобилите прервать молчание".

traits.locale_text: "Губернатор Медина ожидает вас у себя в командном центре, чтобы поговорить о делах. Однако я хочу просить вас повременить с визитом к губернатору и вместо этого обратить взор к станции Навис Нобилите. Мы отчаянно нуждаемся в новом Навигаторе, а наши запросы связи по прежнему игнорируются. Я не вижу, что, кроме личного визита персоны вашего положения, может заставить представителей Навис Нобилите прервать молчание".

languages.text: "Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss matters, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your stature can convince the representatives of the Navis Nobilite to break their silence."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор Медина ожидает вас у себя в командном центре, чтобы поговорить о делах. Однако я хочу просить вас повременить с визитом к губернатору и вместо этого обратить взор к станции Навис Нобилите. Мы отчаянно нуждаемся в новом навигаторе, а наши запросы связи по прежнему игнорируются. Я не вижу, что, кроме личного визита персоны вашего положения, может заставить представителей Навис Нобилите прервать молчание".

traits.locale_text: "Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss the pressing issues, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your statue can convince the representatives of Navis Nobilite to break the silence."

"Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss the pressing issues, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your statue can convince the representatives of Navis Nobilite to break the silence."

"Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss some pressing issues, but I ask you to delay that visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your statue can convince the representatives of Navis Nobilite to break their silence."

"Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss some pressing issues, but I ask you to delay that visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your statue can convince the representatives of Navis Nobilite to break their silence."

"Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss some pressing issues, but I ask you to delay that visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your statue can convince the representatives of Navis Nobilite to break their silence."

languages.text: « Le gouverneur Medineh vous attend au centre de commandement pour vous entretenir des certaines affaires, mais je vous demande de retarder votre visite et de vous tourner en premier lieu vers la station de la Navis Nobilite. Alors que nous avons désespérément besoin d'un nouveau navigateur, nos demandes de communication restent malheureusement sans réponse. Je gage que la visite d'une personnalité publique aussi prestigieuse que vous saura convaincre les représentants de cette organisation de sortir de leur mutisme. »
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss matters, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your stature can convince the representatives of the Navis Nobilite to break their silence."

traits.locale_text: « Le gouverneur Medineh vous attend au centre de commandement pour vous entretenir des certaines affaires, mais je vous demande de retarder votre visite et de vous tourner en premier lieu vers la station de la Navis Nobilite. Alors que nous avons désespérément besoin d'un nouveau navigateur, nos demandes de communication restent malheureusement sans réponse. Je gage que la visite d'une personnalité publique aussi prestigieuse que vous saura convaincre les représentants de cette organisation de sortir de leur mutisme. »

languages.text: "Gouverneur Medineh wartet zur Besprechung in der Befehlszentrale auf Euch, aber ich bitte Euch, den Besuch zu verzögern und Euren Blick stattdessen der Navis-Nobilite-Station zuzuwenden. Wir benötigen verzweifelt einen neuen Navigator, aber all unsere Kommunikationsanfragen werden immer noch ignoriert. Ich sehe keinen anderen Weg, die Vertreter des Navis Nobilite dazu zu bringen, ihr Schweigen zu brechen, als den persönlichen Besuch {mf|eines Mannes|einer Frau} Eures Kalibers."
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss matters, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your stature can convince the representatives of the Navis Nobilite to break their silence."

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneur Medineh wartet in der Befehlszentrale auf Euch, um über dringende Angelegenheiten zu sprechen. Ich bitte Euch jedoch, den Besuch noch hinauszuschieben und Euren Blick stattdessen auf die Navis-Nobilite-Station zu richten. Wir benötigen dringend einen neuen Navigator, doch alle unsere Kommunikationsanfragen werden ignoriert. Man kann die Vertreter der Navis Nobilite wohl nur überzeugen, ihr Schweigen zu brechen, indem {mf|ein Mann|eine Frau} von Eurer Position sie persönlich besucht."

"Gouverneur Medineh wartet in der Befehlszentrale auf Euch, um über dringende Angelegenheiten zu sprechen. Ich bitte Euch jedoch, den Besuch noch hinauszuschieben und Euren Blick stattdessen auf die Navis-Nobilite-Station zu richten. Wir benötigen dringend einen neuen Navigator, doch alle unsere Kommunikationsanfragen werden ignoriert. Man kann die Vertreter der Navis Nobilite wohl nur überzeugen, ihr Schweigen zu brechen, indem {mf|ein Mann|eine Frau} von Eurer Position sie persönlich besucht."

languages.text: «El gobernador Medineh le espera en el centro de mando para hablar de unos asuntos, pero le pediría que posponga la visita y se dirija a la estación de la Navis Nobilite. Necesitamos urgentemente a un nuevo navegante, pero siguen ignorando todos nuestros intentos de comunicarnos con ellos. Tal vez una visita de alguien de su calibre sea lo único que rompa el silencio de los representantes de la Navis Nobilite».
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss matters, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your stature can convince the representatives of the Navis Nobilite to break their silence."

traits.locale_text: «El gobernador Medineh le espera en el centro de mando para hablar de unos asuntos, pero le pediría que posponga la visita y se dirija a la estación de la Navis Nobilite. Necesitamos urgentemente a un nuevo navegante, pero siguen ignorando todos nuestros intentos de comunicarnos con ellos. Tal vez una visita de alguien de su calibre sea lo único que rompa el silencio de los representantes de la Navis Nobilite».

languages.text: “梅迪涅总督正在指挥中心等您，想要与您商讨部分事项，但我请求您推迟这次拜访，将您的目光投向导航宗族的星站。我们急需一名新的导航者，但我们向那座星站发送的所有的通信请求，目前都未得到任何回应。”
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss matters, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your stature can convince the representatives of the Navis Nobilite to break their silence."

traits.locale_text: “梅迪涅总督正在指挥中心等您，想要与您商讨部分事项，但我请求您推迟这次拜访，将您的目光投向导航宗族的星站。我们急需一名新的导航者，但我们向那座星站发送的所有的通信请求，目前都未得到任何回应。”
“梅迪涅总督正在指挥中心等您，想要与您商讨部分紧迫的问题，但我请求您推迟这次拜访，将您的目光投向导航宗族的星站。我们急需一名新的导航者，但我们向那座星站发送的所有的通信请求，都没有得到任何回应。”

languages.text: 「メディネ総督が話し合いのため司令部でお待ちですが、そちらは後にしていただいて航宙族ステーションを先に見てください。我々は今新しい航宙士がどうしても必要なのです。しかし我々の通信リクエストに対していまだに応答がありません。あなたのような方に直接、航宙貴族を説得していただくしか方法はないと思うのです」
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss matters, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your stature can convince the representatives of the Navis Nobilite to break their silence."

traits.locale_text: 「メディネ総督が話し合いのため司令部でお待ちですが、そちらは後にしていただいて航宙族ステーションを先に見てください。我々は今新しい航宙士がどうしても必要なのです。しかし我々の通信リクエストに対していまだに応答がありません。あなたのような方に直接、航宙貴族を説得していただくしか方法はないと思うのです」

languages.text: "Vali Medineh, meseleleri tartışmak için komuta merkezinde seni bekliyor ancak senden bu ziyareti biraz geciktirerek dikkatini Navis Nobilite İstasyonu'na çevirmeni rica ediyorum. Yeni bir Rotacı'ya son derece ihtiyacımız var, tüm iletişim talepleri hâlâ yok sayılıyor. Böylesine mühim bir {mf|beyden|hanımdan} gelecek şahsi bir ziyaretten başka hiçbir şeyin, Navis Nobilite temsilcilerini sessizliklerini bozmaya ikna edebileceğini sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh is waiting for you in the command centre to discuss matters, but I ask you to delay the visit and turn your gaze to the Navis Nobilite station instead. We are in desperate need of a new Navigator, but all our communication requests are still being ignored. I do not see how anything other than a personal visit from a {mf|man|woman} of your stature can convince the representatives of the Navis Nobilite to break their silence."
